item.description:
Stephen Wilkes, Ellis Island:
Ghosts of Freedom  
January 24 ? March 30, 2008
Opening Reception
Thursday, January 24 7-8:30 PM
Open to all. RSVP by January 18, 2008

Join us at 7 PM on January 24, 2008 for the opening reception for Stephen Wilkes, Ellis Island: Ghosts of Freedom , Running Through the Wind and Portrait Collages made possible by our food and beverage sponsors Green Olive Catering and Chamarré Wine. We would like to thank Green Olive Catering and Chamarré Wine for sponsoring the exhibition reception.

Running Through the Wind
Photographs by Frank Rothe
January 24 ? March 30, 2008
Opening Reception
Thursday, January 24 7-8:30 PM
Open to all. RSVP by January 18, 2008

The Portrait Collages
Photographs by Paula Gillen
January 24 ? March 30, 2008
Opening Reception
Thursday, January 24 7-8:30 PM
Open to all. RSVP by January 18, 2008

To RSVP and for more information on these and other upcoming events, call 781-729-1158, email photos@griffinmuseum.org or visit www.griffinmuseum.org. Wheelchair accessible Parking

Griffin Museum of Photography
67 Shore Road
Winchester, MA 01890
781-729-1158
www.griffinmuseum.org

Museum Hours: Monday: Closed. Tuesday/Wednesday: 11:00 AM ? 5:00 PM. Thursday: 11:00 AM -? 5:00 PM (free admission). Friday: 11:00 AM ? 4:00PM. Saturday/Sunday: Noon ? 4:00 PM.

DIRECTIONS Conveniently located near Winchester Center, 3 miles off routes I-93 and I-95, only 15 minutes north of Boston by car, bus or train, and just one block from the Winchester Commuter Rail.
From Boston: Take 93 North to exit 33. At end of ramp, run back left over 93. Take first right (South Border Road). Follow for 2.5 miles through two sets of lights to rotary in center of town. Take first right (Shore Road). Museum is 200 yards ahead on the right.
From Route 128: Take Route 3 South at Burlington. Follow approximately 3 miles. Turn left at second set of lights onto Church Street. Continue 1.5 miles to rotary at center of town. Take third right (Shore Road). Museum is 200 yards ahead on the right.
For more information, visit www.griffinmuseum.org.

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: The Griffin Museum of Photography
